attributes.action: Issue a pardon to the Highlanders of the Black Watch .....
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: executed in the Tower of London in 1743.   These soldiers were executed for mutiny, however, the evidence would suggest that they were making a justifiable statement, after having their contracts broken by the Government of the time.   The political sensitivity is shown by the fact that they were the only "commoners" ever executed within the Tower.   Only ten people were executed in the Tower, everyone else was executed on Tower Hill, outside the Walls !
